snippet.title: Rune Fencer Illyia - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Rune Fencer Illyia is a massive metroidvania where you steal enemy abilities. Coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch.
Follow our Kickstarter here: https://bit.ly/RFI_KS
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/RuneFencerIllyiaSteamPage

Explore a massive, beautiful fantasy world! Steal enemy abilities and fight them back with their own runic magic and deadly swordplay in this handcrafted Metroidvania -- a love letter to Castlevania, Metroid, Zelda and PS1 action-RPGs.

Rune Fencer Illyia is an intense, atmospheric action-platformer with a heavy focus on rewarding exploration, heartfelt storytelling and fast-paced combat.
